pullRequest.title: Add record to db for stream files in valid folder
pullRequest.bodyText:
Detailed description:

Add java flyway migration to add stream file records to db for files in valid folder without a record

Which issue(s) this PR fixes:
Fixes #1325
Special notes for your reviewer:
Tested in local environment using DEMO network, upgrading from 0.16.0 to 0.24.0-rc2, then upgrading to the version with the patch.
Checklist

 Documentation added
 Tests updated

commit.message:
add java flyway migration to add stream file records to db for files in valid folder without a record

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

clean up test case

remove unused import

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Looks like we're missing a test for this.
In this case you could have the directory not exist or have the FIleCopier put a file instead of the directory

commit.message:
Merge branch 'master' into add-streamfile-record

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

change base class to MirrorBaseJavaMigration, add test for valid path not a directory

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>
